com.vftlite.io

Class FileReaderSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vftlite.io.FileReaderSaver

  • public class FileReaderSaver
extends java.lang.Object

    Save and read files

    The FileReaderSaver implements a class that can be used to save jdom document into xml files and read xml files or video files.

    Author:
    Saverio Meucci

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileReaderSaver(java.lang.String url)
      This constructor is used to create an object when the read feature is needed.
      FileReaderSaver(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String xmlDestinationPath)
      This constructor is used to create an object when the save feature is needed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileReaderSaver

        public FileReaderSaver(java.lang.String url,
                       java.lang.String xmlDestinationPath)
        This constructor is used to create an object when the save feature is needed.
        Parameters:
        url - This is the first parameter and represents the name of the file to save.
        xmlDestinationPath - This is the second parameter and represents the output folder, where the file will be saved.

      • FileReaderSaver

        public FileReaderSaver(java.lang.String url)
        This constructor is used to create an object when the read feature is needed.
        Parameters:
        url - This is the only parameter and represents the absolute path of the file to read.
